EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-26-Toronto-Community-Appreciation-Event.ES-2017- (4 Weeks Out).EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Toronto IT Community Appreciation - Stryke Target Range
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on October 26th, for the Toronto IT Community Appreciation Event at Stryke Target Range. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry. Toronto IT Community Appreciation <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto/]]>
Where: Stryke Target Range 738 Dundas St. E, Toronto, ON M5A 2C3 Thursday, October 26th 4:00pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-toronto/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
